attributes.action: I would like there to be more help with mental health x
attributes.additional_details: Mental health is a very serious problem that needs more people to support them to make them stronger
attributes.background:
I think everyone should be happy and that there should be a lot more help for
Mental house so then families will not be loosing members at a young age

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like the Government to provide more support for mental health, but we're not sure exactly what support you'd like the Government to introduce. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to consider signing one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250915
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/239701
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/252934
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243332
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241928
